title: Video: Only Real – Cinnamon Toast
body:
Forgive me for being over presumptuous, but this may well be one of the tracks of the year.

With a healthy smattering of gritty Brit-pop influence, alongside a youthful, charismatic eloquence more befitting of the **Beastie Boys**, West London’s **Only Real** aka **Niall Galvin** creates something truly unique. In his latest track and video _Cinnamon Toast_, there’s a lazy exuberance (if that makes sense), in that it feels so laidback it’s almost horizontal, yet every aspect is clearly considered to the nth degree. Check out the video below and keep up with **Only Real** via his [Facebook](http://www.facebook.com/onlyrealreal).
